title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, September 29, 2019
description: It is believed to be the birthday of Miguel de Cervantes (1547), who first envisioned his masterpiece “Don Quixote” while in a Spanish prison.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It is believed to be the birthday of Miguel de Cervantes (1547), who first envisioned his masterpiece “Don Quixote” while in a Spanish prison.
